newsitem.title: ESTONIA: 20.1 PERCENT OF CENTRAL BUDGET COLLECTED IN Q1.
newsitem.headline: 20.1 PERCENT OF CENTRAL BUDGET COLLECTED IN Q1.

text.p: The ministry of finance said on Thursday that the final corrected data for 1997 first quarter budget collection was 20.87 percent of yearly planned revenues.
Collected revenue in the first quarter was 2.61 billion kroons, a slight decrease compared to their earlier data of 2.62 billion kroons, the ministry said in a statement.
Tax from companies in the first quarter was 184 million kroons of which only 16.7 percent of expected revenue, the ministry added.
